page.title: 14A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: My Mum wakes me up at about 7.30. For breakfast I have Rice Crispies followed by yoghurt.When I am ready it is about 8.30.I arrive at school about 8.40.Then we have various lessons like maths,english or unfinished work.We go to assembly every day except Thursday when we have radio assembly.Afterwards we go out for break and play football unless we have wet play when I draw.Then we do maths or english.We have lunch at 12.00.After lunch we have break but some people go to Computer Club.Play ends at 1.25 and we do various things such as topic,art or games.For games we play soccer depending on the time of year.At 3.30 we go home.After school I do my homework and play with my friend Gye on bikes.At about 9.00 I go to bed.
